explains: adj. 不易忘怀的，萦绕于心头的
n. 对（某地的）经常光顾
v. （鬼魂）出没；萦绕在……心中；（长期）困扰；（haunt 的现在分词）

sentences.en: No matter, she found that it was an idea that would not down,' but persisted in haunting her.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样，她发现这是一个不会罢休的念头，它始终萦绕在她心头。

sentences.en: Monks in orange robes offer flowers and food to the gods and produce haunting sounds on conch shells.
sentences.cn: 身穿橘袍的僧人向神灵献上鲜花和食物，并在海螺壳上发出萦绕不去的声音。

sentences.en: In another called in vivo desensitization, they are exposed, while awake, to what may be haunting them in their sleep.
sentences.cn: 在另一个被称为体内脱敏现象中，在清醒状态下，他们被暴露在他们睡梦中缠扰着他们的东西前。
